RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStatsLocalId.summary: The dictionary's localId property is a string that can be used to identify the object whose matches this value.

remarks.para: Together, these two objects provide statistics about the inbound and outbound sides of the same synchronization source (SSRC).

RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStatsLocalId.value: A string which can be compared to the value of an object's property to see if the two represent statistics for each of the two sides of the same set of data sent by the local peer.
